label: The NodeJS Master Class
description: No Frameworks, No NPM, No Dependencies. This is a self-paced online course consisting of 83 video lectures, 3 large projects, 7 small projects, 6 homework assignments, a few quizzes, and a final exam.

label: Let's start with Javascript
description: An introducing course from scratch for who wish to learn and dive into Javascript. This course includes summaries, exercises and workshops.

label: How to code for entrepeneurs
description: Basic concepts about HTML and CSS, we are going to see how to create our first website by using those technologies and how to give a good look and feel using CSS.

label: React Basic in Just One Hour
description: This short course will cover basic and core concepts that you need to know to get up and running with ReactJS.React JS is a Javascript library for building user interfaces. It's flexible, fast, easy to learn and fun to work with. ReactJS is designed to make the process of building modular, reusable user interface components simple and intuitive.
